title: Do I get charged when the order is dispatched or before it is dispatched? (Pixel 4a)
content: I ordered a google pixel 4a on the 24th October and so far it been a week and I have not yet received any bank statement via email saying I paid or anything and I checked the tracking site and it says "not yet dispatched" and with an estimated delivery time of 11 - 12 November. Is this normal or is there something wrong with my order?
